name: $deleteCookie
description: Delete a cookie by setting it to expire

name: $getCookie
description: Get a cookie value from the request

name: $getCookies
description: Get all cookies from the request

name: $setCookie
description: Set a cookie in the response

args.name: options
args.description: Cookie options (JSON: {maxAge, path, domain, secure, httpOnly, sameSite, expires})

name: $getBody
description: Gets the request body from POST, PUT, PATCH requests

name: $getHeader
description: Get a header value from the request

name: $getHeaders
description: Returns all request headers

name: $getIP
description: Gets the client's IP address with version info

name: $getMethod
description: Get the HTTP method of the request

name: $getParameter
description: Get a URL parameter value by index or name

name: $getProxiedIP
description: Gets the client's real IP address through PROXY Protocol (nginx, cloudflare, etc.)

name: $getQuery
description: Get a query parameter value from the URL (decoded)

name: $getUrl
description: Get the full URL of the request

name: $isSSL
description: Check if connection uses SSL/TLS (based on app type or headers)

name: $updateRoutes
description: Reload all routes from the previously set directory

name: $redirect
description: Redirect to a specified URL

name: $sendHtml
description: Send HTML response

name: $sendJson
description: Send JSON response

name: $sendText
description: Send a text response

name: $setYield
description: Indicates that the current route handler did not handle the request, allowing the router to continue searching for other matching handlers

name: $writeHeader
description: Set an HTTP header for the response

name: $writeStatus
description: Set the HTTP status code for the response

args.name: status
args.description: Status code and message (e.g., '404 Not Found')
